questions.question: What is the primary material visibly comprising the majority of the container?
What is the overall shape of the presented measuring container?
What is the dominant color of the container's body, excluding markings?
What type of markings are present along the side of the container?
Considering the markings, what unit of measurement is indicated?
What is the general form or style of the measurement markings?
Describe the visual texture of the outer surface of the container.
What color is the print of the measurement numbers and indicators?
Is there an indicator of the maximum capacity printed on the container?
What is the shape of the container's top rim or opening?
Does the container appear to have a noticeable lip or pour spout?
Does the container exhibit any apparent surface irregularities or damage?
Describe the style of the printed text indicating the milliliter capacity.
What is the approximate number of measurement markings visible on the side?
Based on visual inspection, is the container's transparency uniform across its surface?
